163 #define TEST_COMPARE_ARRAYS( a1, a2 ) \
164  { \
165  const bool l_result = compareArrays(a1,#a1,a2,#a2,out); \
166  if (!l_result) success = false; \
167  }
168 
169 
177 #define TEST_COMPARE_FLOATING_ARRAYS( a1, a2, tol ) \
178  { \
179  const bool result = compareFloatingArrays(a1,#a1,a2,#a2,tol,out); \
180  if (!result) success = false; \
181  }
182

190  TEUCHOS_TEST_THROW( code, ExceptType, out, success )

197 #define TEST_NOTHROW( code ) \
198  TEUCHOS_TEST_NOTHROW( code, out, success )
